title: AirPods Pro with the MagSafe charging case are down to $190
content:
Apple might not have released a new version of the AirPods Pro at its “Unleashed” event, but it did release a new MagSafe case for the existing model. And today they’re nearly as cheap as the third-gen AirPods: Amazon is selling the newest version of AirPods Pro for $190, the lowest price we’ve seen so far.

The AirPods Pro with the MagSafe charging case have the same features as the previous model: noise-cancellation, spatial audio support, and a secure fit with silicon tips. They also support hands-free Siri and have excellent battery life with expanded charging options: wired, wireless, or MagSafe.

With Black Friday looming, we’re not sure how low AirPods Pro will go, but this is the lowest price we’ve tracked for the newer case. And with supply chain and production issues affecting the supply of basically everything, if you want a pair, you should probably grab one right now.

Apple AirPods Pro

Read our review
MSRP: $249
Best Prices Today: $189.99 at Amazon | $229.99 at Best Buy
author: Michael Simon
